indicator_name: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita
target_name: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 232 KB)
computation_definitions: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is the main measure of the size of the economy, representing the total value of all final goods and services produced in a defined time period. The ONS has published What is GDP? and GDP and me to explain what GDP is and how it relates to everyday life.
graph_title: Annual growth rate (%) of GDP per capita
source_other_info_1: Link leads to an entire dataset that includes multiple time series. This indicator uses the time series with code n3y6.
other_info: Data follows the UN specification for this indicator. This indicator has been identified in collaboration with topic experts.
page_content:
